Package org.neo4j.kernel.impl.api.index.stats

Class IndexStatisticsLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.index.internal.gbptree.Layout.Adapter<IndexStatisticsKey,​IndexStatisticsValue>
      • org.neo4j.kernel.impl.api.index.stats.IndexStatisticsLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparator<IndexStatisticsKey>, Layout<IndexStatisticsKey,​IndexStatisticsValue>
    public class IndexStatisticsLayout
extends Layout.Adapter<IndexStatisticsKey,​IndexStatisticsValue>
    GBPTree layout in IndexStatisticsStore, using IndexStatisticsKey and IndexStatisticsValue.

        Reads key contents at cursor at its current offset into key.
        Parameters:
        cursor - PageCursor to read from, at current offset.
        into - key instances to read into.
        keySize - size of key to read or Layout.FIXED_SIZE_KEY if key is fixed size.
